name: A Quack In Time (Champlain Game Academy 22)
name_original: A Quack In Time (Champlain Game Academy 22)
description:
This is a story about a duck who waddled into a science research facility looking for bread and walked into a time traveling machine in search of it.

In his quest to find the delicious loaf, he travels through the ages in a beak-breaking journey

He doesn’t need to go back, he’s a duck. Nothing to go back to.
